text: Neil Brannon (October 29, 1940 â€“ September 22, 2020) was an American politician. He was in the Oklahoma House of Representatives from the 3rd district from 2002 to 2010. He was a member of the Democratic Party. Brannon was born in Muse, Oklahoma. Brannon died of a heart attack on September 22, 2020, in Fort Smith, Arkansas at age 79. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2020 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Oklahoma Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction
title: Neil Brannon
